tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.emberlash:
§6Unique Effect: Smoulder§r
Your attacks apply Smouldering.

§2On Right Click:§r
Dash %d blocks in the direction you are looking and healing for %d%% of your Max HP.
Attacking enemies afflicted with Smouldering deals an additional %d damage per stack.

When holding Shift, dash in the opposite direction.
 
The ability gains an extra charge if you wield two Emberlash, but only the first charge restores HP.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.moltenedg:
§6Unique Effect: Molten Roar§r
On hit, sets the enemy on fire.
 
When HP is low, gain Strength, Haste, and Speed.

§2On Right Click:§r
Lose 4 HP and gain Regeneration for 10 seconds.

Buffs increase for every 20% of missing HP.
 
Effects gain an extra level if you wield two Molten Edge.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.rendsword:
§6Unique Effect: Soul Rend§r
On hit, applies a stacking debuff.
 
§2On Right Click:§r
Consume all stacks from nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and healing yourself based on the number of stacks consumed.

Damage scales with the total stacks on the target: %d damage per stack for the first %d stacks, %d damage per stack for the next %d, then %d damage per stack, and so on.
 
Heals %d HP per stack removed.
Max healing: %d%% of Max HP.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.shadowsti:
§6Unique Effect: Shadowmist§r
Deals magical damage instead of physical.

§2On Right Click:§r
Blinds nearby enemies and teleports you %d blocks forward.
Damage increases by %d%% for each point of the target's armor.
Holding Shift teleports you in the opposite direction.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.solupyrei:
§6Unique Effect: Soul Tether§r
On hit, applies Wither %d for %d seconds.
 
§2On Right Click:§r
Teleport a selected target to yourself from up to %d blocks away.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.starsedge:
§6Unique Effect: Star's Edge§r
Deals an additional %d magic damage.
 
§2On Right Click:§r
Save your current position and dash forward.
Gain Speed %d and Haste %d for %d seconds.
 
After %d seconds, or when you use Star's Edge again, teleport back to your starting position.
Hold Shift while using to prevent dashing.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.stormsedg:
§6Unique Effect: Storm Jolt§r
On hit, reduces cooldown by %d second.

§2On Right Click:§r
Dash %d blocks in the direction you are looking, dealing normal attack damage to enemies in your path.
 
You gain the effects of Haste and Speed.
Includes hits from an active ability.
If you already have Haste, its level increases by 1, up to a maximum of level %d.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.watchersw:
§6Unique Effect: Omen§r
When killing an enemy, heal for %d%% of the victim's Max HP.
 
§6Unique Effect: Watcher§r
Heal for %d HP on hit.
tooltip.simply_swords_overhaul.whisperwi:
§6Unique Effect: Fatal Flicker§r
Killing an enemy resets this ability’s cooldown, including kills from an active ability.
 
§2On Right Click:§r
Dash forward up to %d blocks, dealing critical attack damage to enemies in your path.
